article.bdy:
A Workgroup may refer to
a peer-to-peer PC computer network. See Workgroup (Computer networking)
a group of people working together toward a common goal, also known as a working group
the web2.0 workgroup, a group of blogs covering web2.0
a Courtroom Workgroup, an informal arrangement between a criminal prosecutor, criminal defense attorney, and the judicial officer
This page lists articles associated with the same title. If an internal linkled you here, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.''
WORKGROUP has: Local security,No centralised administration,No user level restriction,Small in size,Same subnet & peer-peer network
